subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Forward David Clarkson, still a tough guy, is producing on the Devils’ No. 2 line and already has 24 goals this season, surpassing his career high of 17.
snippet: Forward David Clarkson, still a tough guy, is producing on the Devils’ No. 2 line and already has 24 goals this season, surpassing his career high of 17.
